content: आयत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [आ-यत्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Dependence, subjection. {@--2@} Affection. {@--3@} Strength, power, might. {@--4@} Boundary, limit. {@--5@} An expedient, remedy. {@--6@} Majesty, dignity. {@--7@} A day. {@--8@} Steadiness of conduct, continuance in the right path. {@--9@} Length. {@--10@} Future time (These two senses should perhaps be referred to आयति <ab>q. v.</ab>).
